title: Chunky Lentil and Vegetable Soup
description: A quick, hearty and flavorful lentil soup (with optional sausage) that can serve as a comforting winter meal

directions.text: Mince the garlic and dice the onion. Cook both in a large pot with olive oil over medium heat until tender.
Slice the celery and peel and slice the carrots. Add the celery and carrots to the pot and continue to saute.

Drain the can of black beans and add it to the pot along with the dry lentils, cumin, oregano, smoked paprika, cayenne pepper, and some freshly cracked black pepper (10-15 cranks), and continue to saute.
Add the diced tomatoes (with juices) and vegetable broth, and stir to combine.
Increase heat to high and allow pot to come to a boil, then turn heat down to low, place lid on top and let simmer until lentils are tender. Taste soup and add salt as needed.
